Name: The Witcher
Star: Henry Cavill, Freya Allan, Anya Chalotra, Mimi Ndiweni
Summary: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Name: Don't Look Up
Star: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jennifer Lawrence, Meryl Streep, Cate Blanchett
Summary: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

Name: Hawkeye
Star: Jeremy Renner, Hailee Steinfeld, Florence Pugh, Vera Farmiga
Summary: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

Star: Sam Elliott, Tim McGraw, Faith Hill, Isabel May
Summary: Follows the Dutton family on a journey west through the Great Plains toward the last bastion of untamed America.

Name: Yellowstone
Star: Brecken Merrill, Jefferson White, Gil Birmingham, Kevin Costner
Summary: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

Name: The Wheel of Time
Star: Rosamund Pike, Daniel Henney, Madeleine Madden, Zoë Robins
Summary: Set in a high fantasy world where magic exists, but only some can access it, a woman named Moiraine crosses paths with five young men and women. This sparks a dangerous, world-spanning journey. Based on the book series by Robert Jordan.

Name: The Northman
Star: Alexander Skarsgård, Anya Taylor-Joy, Willem Dafoe, Nicole Kidman
Summary: From acclaimed director Robert Eggers, The Northman is an epic revenge thriller that explores how far a Viking prince will go to seek justice for his murdered father.

Name: Succession
Star: Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin, Peter Friedman
Summary: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

Name: Encanto
Director: Jared Bush, Byron Howard, Charise Castro Smith
Star: Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo, Mauro Castillo
Summary: A young Colombian girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

Name: The Unforgivable
Star: Sandra Bullock, Viola Davis, Vincent D'Onofrio, Jon Bernthal
Summary: A woman is released from prison after serving a sentence for a violent crime and re-enters a society that refuses to forgive her past.

Name: Love Actually
Star: Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Liam Neeson, Laura Linney
Summary: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

Name: Being the Ricardos
Star: Nicole Kidman, Javier Bardem, J.K. Simmons, Nina Arianda
Summary: Follows Lucy and Desi as they face a crisis that could end their careers and another that could end their marriage.

Name: Dexter: New Blood
Star: Michael C. Hall, Jack Alcott, Julia Jones, Johnny Sequoyah
Summary: Set 10 years after Dexter Morgan went missing in the eye of Hurricane Laura, he is now living under an assumed name in Upstate New York, Iron Lake, far from his original home in Miami.

Name: Emily in Paris
Star: Lily Collins, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu, Ashley Park, Lucas Bravo
Summary: A young American woman from the Midwest is hired by a marketing firm in Paris to provide them with an American perspective on things.

Name: Licorice Pizza
Star: Alana Haim, Cooper Hoffman, Sean Penn, Tom Waits
Summary: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

Name: The Power of the Dog
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Kirsten Dunst, Jesse Plemons, Kodi Smit-McPhee
Summary: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Name: Pushpa: The Rise - Part 1
Star: Allu Arjun, Fahadh Faasil, Rashmika Mandanna, Dhananjaya
Summary: Story of Pushpa Raj, a lorry driver in Seshachalam forests of South India, set in the backdrop of red sandalwood smuggling. Red Sandalwood is endemic to South-Eastern Ghats (mountain range) of India.

Name: West Side Story
Star: Ansel Elgort, Rachel Zegler, Ariana DeBose, David Alvarez
Summary: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

Name: It's a Wonderful Life
Star: James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell
Summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Name: Station Eleven
Star: Joe Pingue, Mackenzie Davis, Himesh Patel, Matilda Lawler
Summary: A post apocalyptic saga spanning multiple timelines, telling the stories of survivors of a devastating flu as they attempt to rebuild and reimagine the world anew while holding on to the best of what's been lost.

Name: Nightmare Alley
Star: Bradley Cooper, Cate Blanchett, Toni Collette, Willem Dafoe
Summary: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people with a few well-chosen words hooks up with a female psychiatrist who is even more dangerous than he is.

Name: Arcane
Star: Hailee Steinfeld, Kevin Alejandro, Jason Spisak, Harry Lloyd
Summary: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

Name: Daredevil
Star: Charlie Cox, Vincent D'Onofrio, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson
Summary: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.

Name: Game of Thrones
Star: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington, Lena Headey
Summary: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Name: Dune
Star: Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Zendaya, Oscar Isaac
Summary: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

Name: Death on the Nile
Star: Kenneth Branagh, Gal Gadot, Tom Bateman, Rose Leslie
Summary: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.

Name: The Last Duel
Star: Matt Damon, Adam Driver, Jodie Comer, Harriet Walter
Summary: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

Name: Money Heist
Star: Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño, Pedro Alonso
Summary: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

Name: Yellowjackets
Star: Melanie Lynskey, Tawny Cypress, Ella Purnell, Sophie Nélisse
Summary: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Ontario wilderness.

Name: And Just Like That...
Star: Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon, Kristin Davis, Sara Ramirez
Summary: The series will follow Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Name: A Boy Called Christmas
Star: Maggie Smith, Isabella O'Sullivan, Joel Fry, Eden Lawrence
Summary: In this origin story of Father Christmas, an ordinary boy (with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side) sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm.

Name: The French Dispatch
Star: Benicio Del Toro, Adrien Brody, Tilda Swinton, Léa Seydoux
Summary: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".

Name: House of Gucci
Star: Lady Gaga, Adam Driver, Al Pacino, Jeremy Irons
Summary: When Patrizia Reggiani, an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel their legacy and triggers a reckless spiral of betrayal, decadence, revenge, and ultimately...murder.

Name: The Expanse
Star: Steven Strait, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham, Shohreh Aghdashloo
Summary: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.

Name: Grey's Anatomy
Star: Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers
Summary: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Name: The Santa Clause
Star: Tim Allen, Judge Reinhold, Wendy Crewson, Eric Lloyd
Summary: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

Name: Ted Lasso
Star: Jason Sudeikis, Brett Goldstein, Brendan Hunt, Nick Mohammed
Summary: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League soccer team.

Star: Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Tahir Raj Bhasin, Jiiva
Summary: On June 25, 1983, the Lord's Cricket Ground witnessed 14 men beat the two times World Champions West Indies, putting India back onto the cricket world stage.

Name: tick, tick...BOOM!
Star: Andrew Garfield, Alexandra Shipp, Robin de Jesus, Vanessa Hudgens
Summary: On the cusp of his 30th birthday, a promising young theater composer navigates love, friendship and the pressures of life as an artist in New York City.

Name: Swan Song
Star: Mahershala Ali, Naomie Harris, Awkwafina, Glenn Close
Summary: In the near future, a terminally ill man explores a heart wrenching, emotionally complex solution to save his wife and son from grief by duplicating himself without them knowing.

Name: Scrooged
Star: Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, John Glover
Summary: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Name: Dexter
Star: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, David Zayas, James Remar
Summary: He's smart. He's lovable. He's Dexter Morgan, America's favorite serial killer, who spends his days solving crimes and nights committing them. Golden Globe winner Michael C. Hall stars in the hit SHOWTIME Original Series.

Name: Euphoria
Star: Zendaya, Hunter Schafer, Sydney Sweeney, Jacob Elordi
Summary: A look at life for a group of high school students as they grapple with issues of drugs, sex, and violence.

Name: Dopesick
Star: Michael Keaton, Peter Sarsgaard, Michael Stuhlbarg, Will Poulter
Summary: The series takes viewers to the epicenter of America's struggle with opioid addiction, from the boardrooms of Purdue Pharma, to a distressed Virginia mining community, to the hallways of the DEA.

Name: The Hand of God
Star: Filippo Scotti, Toni Servillo, Teresa Saponangelo, Marlon Joubert
Summary: In 1980s Naples, young Fabietto pursues his love for football as family tragedy strikes, shaping his uncertain but promising future as a filmmaker.

Name: The Tragedy of Macbeth
Star: Denzel Washington, Frances McDormand, Alex Hassell, Bertie Carvel
Summary: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, and his ambitious wife supports him in his plans of seizing power.

Name: The Walking Dead
Star: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan
Summary: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

Name: Lost in Space
Star: Molly Parker, Toby Stephens, Maxwell Jenkins, Taylor Russell
Summary: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fight against all odds to survive and escape, but they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

Name: Avengers: Endgame
Star: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Name: The Girl Before
Star: Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Ben Hardy, Jessica Plummer, David Oyelowo
Summary: Jane falls in love with an extraordinary minimalist house, but when she discovers that another damaged woman died in the same property three years earlier, she starts to wonder if her own story is just a rerun of the girl before.
